title: Configure ExportOptions.plist for App Store
description: Create an ExportOptions.plist file for automated App Store submissions.
instructions: Write an ExportOptions.plist that configures: 1) app-store distribution method, 2) Team ID 'ABC123XYZ', 3) Upload symbols enabled, 4) Destination set to upload, 5) Provisioning profile mapping for bundle ID 'com.example.flutterapp' using profile 'Flutter App Store Profile'.

hints.text: Use <key>name</key> followed by <string>value</string> for string values
The provisioningProfiles is a nested dict with bundle ID as key and profile name as value

commonMistakes.mistake: Using wrong method value (e.g., 'appstore' instead of 'app-store')
commonMistakes.consequence: Export fails with invalid method error
commonMistakes.correction: Use exactly 'app-store' with hyphen for App Store distribution

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to include the provisioningProfiles dict
commonMistakes.consequence: Xcode may select wrong profile or fail to find matching profile
commonMistakes.correction: Always specify explicit profile mapping with bundle ID as key
